conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and determine which container each liquid will flow into.
Three sources of liquid labeled A, B, and C; three containers labeled D, E, and F.
Liquid from A flows into container D.
Liquid from B flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
Orange liquid from A flows into container D.
Purple liquid from B flows into container E.
White liquid from C flows into container F.
Orange liquid from A flows into container D.
Purple liquid from B flows into container E.
White liquid from C flows into container F.
